projectdescription: The EasySystems documentation is based on Facebook's open source project 'Docusaurus' - an optimized page generator built in React. For this project, I customized Docusaurus to create a better user experience. I created custom components and much more to make the documentation of the Discord app more accessible to everyone. Now I'm manage this opensource project.

This is my personal portfolio. If you're reading this, chances are you're looking at my portfolio! ðŸ¥¹ It's an AstroJS-built application. The website is fully responsive, and the source code is on GitHub. I picked AstroJS as the framework because I wanted to learn something new. This way, I have a live project where I can test my learning curve with Astro.
